description:
Find your flow-state in this light and comfy jersey. Printed with heatmap inspired graphics, the Roam highlights the beauty of the trails. Made from fully recycled material, this shirt keeps its footprint low while keeping you cool. And, a Polygiene antimicrobial treatment means more riding and less laundry.

  • Lightweight recycled polyester dries quickly and breathes well
  • Subtle texture on the back of the material helps keep it off the skin and improves wicking
  • Polygiene® antimicrobial treatment reduces odour retention
  • Articulated patterning leaves lots of room to move when you're focusing on your bike-body separation
  • Long sleeves offer more protection from the trail and UV
  • UPF50+ protection, blocking more than 98% of harsh UV
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh Roam Long Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
